## Commands

### Test

```{r}
devtools::test()
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+T in RStudio


### Load package 

```{r}
devtools::load_all(".")
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+L in RStudio

### Build

```{r}
devtools::build()
```

### Documentation

```{r}
devtools::document()
```
or CTRL+SHIFT+D in RStudio

### To reload R 

CTRL+SHIFT+F10 in RStudio

### To write CSV for test

```{r}
write.csv(analysr_env$descriptions, "after-descriptions.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
